General_Description: '''Target of Choice - Athenian Archers''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "If [[Sparta]] is to gain ground, [[Athens|Athenian]] [[archer]]s must be dealt with."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian archers all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the name [[Dead Archers, Healthy Sparta]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
